tags: god im still so hype for this game
summary: “This city’s always got a promise for you...”  “Career Prospects” Page 1  First page of my Cyberpunk 2077 comic that I made up...
caption:
“This city’s always got a promise for you…”

“Career Prospects” Page 1

First page of my Cyberpunk 2077 comic that I made up just now so I can destroy my art/writer’s block. It’s about my V, her first few few months in Night City, and how she meets everyone’s favourite boy, Jackie. I’m not American, but I imagine Night City is kind of like LA, where everyone lives there wanting to make it big but mostly just end up very hungry and in debt. That’s what happened to V, at least. I’m gonna play a little fast and loose with canon here since I don’t have access to the 2020 rulebook and CDPR has better internal information security than the CIA when it comes to leaks.

I don’t know if plain hoodies and jeans exist in the cyberpunk universe anymore, but let’s just say V is broke and these are cyber hoodies, as you can tell from the neon lines i drew on it, and not because im too tired to draw that damn jacket

summary: Cyberpunk 2077, desarrollador menciona que "nos encantaría brindar apoyo" a la comunidad de mods, pero primero están enfocados...
title: Cyberpunk 2077, desarrollador menciona que "nos encantaría brindar apoyo" a la comunidad de mods, pero primero están enfocados en sacar el juego.
body:
#Cyberpunk2077, desarrollador menciona que “nos encantaría brindar apoyo” a la comunidad de mods, pero primero están enfocados en sacar el juego.

Con las festividades del E3 2019 programadas para comenzar en solo dos semanas, muchos jugadores esperan recibir actualizaciones sobre los proyectos que están anticipando. Un título de este tipo que ha estado en desarrollo durante algún tiempo es Cyberpunk 2077 de CD Projekt Red, que se exhibirá en el próximo evento. Los fanáticos ciertamente esperan saber la fecha de lanzamiento durante…

View On WordPress

summary: Was thinking about, on the way home, how much traffic changes throughout the day in the real world. I hope that the cities...
question: Was thinking about, on the way home, how much traffic changes throughout the day in the real world. I hope that the cities population fluctuates (traffic and people walking around) based on time of day. Especially since they emphasized that the AI have a set schedule. Would be totally neato
answer:
Ooooh this would be so cool! Even in that gameplay video the city looked so alive! Cities have a huge population, it makes sense that there’d be a lot of people about! So in the morning there’s people in suits going to work and at night there’s clubbers! That sort of thing?

If the population fluctuates, I’m sure that would play a part in a lot of quests!

I’m hype!!

summary: Cyberpunk 2077 no se podrá jugar en E3 2019, pero se mostrará nuevo gameplay.
title: Cyberpunk 2077 no se podrá jugar en E3 2019, pero se mostrará nuevo gameplay.
body:
#Cyberpunk2077 no se podrá jugar en #E32019, pero se mostrará nuevo gameplay.

El desarrollador polaco CD Projekt Red comenzó a hablar de sus planes para Cyberpunk 2077 en E3 2019. Desafortunadamente, el muy esperado RPG no se podrá jugar durante el show; pero estará en exhibición para que todos lo vean. No hay presentaciones exclusivas a puerta cerrada este año; Incluso el público podrá ver todo lo que CD Projekt Red trae al E3. 

CD Projekt RED daría a conocer la fecha de…

View On WordPress

summary: Losing a piece of what I found Losing myself in all this crowd If I told you I’d die Would you keep me alive? Oh, would you save...
caption:
Losing a piece of what I found
Losing myself in all this crowd
If I told you I’d die
Would you keep me alive?
Oh, would you save me from myself?
